message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its worth, I'm offering it for $14,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is really my bottom line to make this worthwhile. I'm confident you'll see a significant return on this investment. What do you say?
